field.name: description
field.value:
A NHibernate custom type that implements IParameterizedType supports parameters passing in the mapping declaration. For example:
<property name="Geometry" column="the_geom"> <type name="NHibernate.Spatial.Type.GeometryType, NHibernate.Spatial"> <param name="srid">4326</param> <param name="subtype">POLYGON</param> </type> </property>
Currently, there is no way to map type parameters in ActiveRecord.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: ActiveRecord is not actively maintained, closing this issue as won't fix because of its age. Feel free to relog a new issue on GitHub: https://github.com/castleproject/ActiveRecord/issues
